page.title: 01The Blacksmith
page.content: Mr Wilkins works as the blacksmith in Funtington. The Blacksmith has been on that spot for 300 years. Mr Wilkins has been working there for 20 years. Most blacksmiths like their job. It takes 2 hours to shoe a horse. The horse shoe is made from mild steel. Most blacksmiths make anything else if necessary. Trade is increasing because more people are owning horses. The best nails are from Sweden. The nails are to hold the horse shoe on. A horse needs new horse shoes every 6 to 8 weeks. Mr Wilins shoes 20 to 25 horses a week. Blacksmiths put the hot shoe on the horse foot to see if it fits. Mr Wilkins was trained in the army, it took him 6 years to learn. He gets his metal from a steel stockist.
